name: Leucos
description:
Ever wondered how the white blood cells, a.k.a. "leucocytes", fight infections inside your body? Well, here's a horribly inaccurate representation of that! You assume the role of "Leucos", an adventurous leucocyte that has to singlehandedly defend the vital organs of its hosts. How many waves of enemies can you handle?

How to play

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot
